raw_body: WICKRAMASINGHE – MONICA (Mona) – Daughter of late Oswald and Agnes Pereira,​ beloved wife of late Patrick Wickramasinghe,​ much loved mother of Pamela and late Aloma,​ mother-in-law of late Mervyn Bernard,​ beloved grandmother of Keith & Deepani,​ Sandra and Tamara. Remains lie at A.F. Raymond Parlour,​ Borella on April 9th from 9.00 a.m. to 3.30 p.m. Burial at 4 p.m. RC Section,​ General Cemetery,​ Borella.024710
